text: 13.15 Luk 4.16, Apo 13.27, 15.21, Hib 13.22 Bɨ Juda apnan gɨpal kal ak kod yelɨgɨpal okok, kɨli tɨkjakɨl, Mosis takaw tɨkak ogɨnap, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb tɨkɨlak ogɨnap agñɨlak. Agñɨl, bɨ olap nop agyokel, apɨl Pol ayɨp, Banabas ayɨp kɨlop agak, Mam omɨŋal agak. Binɨb okol nɨg dɨnɨgel tek takaw tep ogɨnap yonɨmuŋ, kɨlop agñɨnɨmil agak.
